text: De, kepat. Wun kamfu sivɨlevekatɨk, Jutasɨlɨn yila autukok saiti yiŋɨmeve. Jutasɨlɨn Jisasɨkɨk 12 guŋgundatɨle yetɨk avɨt. Katɨk sasɨn kavik tonma, yila Gasak Wamɨle Gasak Wakundutɨle* autundi yila Gotkɨk Wulu Kumbaŋgikɨk Balañjutɨle* autundi yila avɨtkasutɨle autun. Kavɨla autun tuaŋpindandi muŋfuŋa mfoveve kɨliatɨk.
